entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`lyric_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `media_id` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `lyric_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `lyric_track_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `lyric_artist_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `lyric_album_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `lyric_duration_name` REAL NOT NULL, `lyric_instrumental` INTEGER NOT NULL, `lyric_plain_lyrics` TEXT NOT NULL, `lyric_synced_lyrics` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`lyric_id`), FOREIGN KEY(`media_id`) REFERENCES `library_media_table`(`media_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`play_list_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `play_list_created_date` INTEGER NOT NULL, `play_list_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `play_list_artwork_uri` TEXT, `is_favorite_playlist` INTEGER)
CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`play_list_name` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`play_list_table`)
contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_play_list_fts_table_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `play_list_table` BEGIN DELETE FROM `play_list_fts_table` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_play_list_fts_table_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `play_list_table` BEGIN DELETE FROM `play_list_fts_table` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_play_list_fts_table_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `play_list_table` BEGIN INSERT INTO `play_list_fts_table`(`docid`, `play_list_name`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`play_list_name`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_play_list_fts_table_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `play_list_table` BEGIN INSERT INTO `play_list_fts_table`(`docid`, `play_list_name`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`play_list_name`); END
